subtitle: Turn the miles between you into meaningful moments of connection through shared language learning

tips.title: Video Call Language Dates
tips.description: Schedule regular video calls dedicated to practicing together. Take turns being the 'teacher' for 15 minutes each, or work through lessons side-by-side while screen sharing. Seeing each other's faces while learning creates intimate moments despite the distance.

tips.title: Async Voice Messages
tips.description: Send each other voice notes in your target language throughout the day. It's like having a mini conversation that spans time zonesâ€”your partner wakes up to your voice practicing new phrases, and you fall asleep to theirs. Much more personal than text!

tips.title: Synchronized Watch Parties
tips.description: Pick a show or movie in your target language and watch it 'together' using sync apps. Pause to discuss new vocabulary, laugh at the same jokes, and practice repeating dialogue. It turns passive watching into active bonding time.

tips.title: Love Letters in Your New Language
tips.description: Write each other letters, texts, or emails in your target language. Start simple and grow together. There's something deeply romantic about expressing love in a language you're both discoveringâ€”every word carries extra meaning and effort.

tips.title: Play Language Games Together
tips.description: Use multiplayer word games, language learning apps with duo modes, or online quizzes in your target language. A little friendly competition keeps things fun and gives you shared goals to work toward, no matter where you are.

tips.title: Plan Your Reunion in the Language
tips.description: Research your next visit togetherâ€”in your target language. Look up restaurants, activities, and travel phrases you'll need. It makes the countdown more exciting and ensures you'll be ready to use your skills when you're finally together again.
